title: Samsung galaxy note 9 original product i lost original email phone number and many apps paid for
content: All provider keeps doing is replacing sim cards SD CARDS but back from 2018 I've lost original log in they changed my emails I lost documents saved to Microsoft and Google but they did nothing but send me to insurance replacement and they just changed phones or emails sim cards sd cards and tell me information lost even though  Google always requires backups emails to get in account again
